item.description:
This course teaches new or inexperienced shooters the foundations in safety and use of all types of shotguns with an emphasis on the ability to hit moving targets such as skeet, trap and sporting clays.

Date: May 1, 2009 (6 - 10 pm) and May 2, 2009 (8 - 4 pm)
Cost is $60 paid in full, in advance to reserve your spot.
POC: Dan Gebers - dpddandre@aol.com

Course Details:

  • Safe firearm handling
  • Firearm parts and operation
  • Ammunition and its function
  • Shooting fundamentals and an opportunity to develop them on the range
  • How to select, clean and store a firearm
  • Review of various activities available to help participants develop and improve their shooting skills.
item.name: NRA Basic Shotgun
